title: Smart Document Upload
description: Upload PDFs, Course materials, Documents. AI instantly processes any format.

title: Chat with Documents
description: Have interactive conversations with your study materials. Ask questions and get instant explanations.

title: Custom Quiz Generation
description: Generate multiple choice, flashcards, or true/false questions. Choose difficulty and question counts.

title: Timed Assessments
description: Take timed quizzes with instant scoring and feedback. Share quiz links with classmates.

title: Progress Dashboard
description: Track study time, quiz performance, and improvement trends with detailed analytics.

title: Mobile & Web Access
description: Study anywhere with responsive web and mobile apps. Sync progress across all devices.
